p: The human non-cancer fibroblast cell line WI38 (ATCC Number CCL-75 – Standards, UK) and macrophage-like murine cell line J774 (ECACC Number 91051511 – Public Health England, UK) were grown in DMEM and RPMI medium (Gibco-Thermo Fisher Scientific, Merelbeke, Belgium or Sigma-Aldrich, Bornem, Belgium), respectively, supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum and penicillin-streptomycin (100 UI/mL) (Sigma-Aldrich, Bornem, Belgium).
